item.title: Help me plz
item.dc:creator: @P3NGU1N1 P3NGU1N!!!
item.description:
@P3NGU1N1 wrote:

Open an Internet Explorer or any other Internet search engine you use then type in the address bar: http://www.moparisthebest.com/

Let the entire screen load.

Then go to these forums but in the server advertisement section and find a server you like that is currently online.

Click on file in the white margin in the first moparscape screen you opened then scroll down to server IP. So you enter the IP given to you by the host in advertisements section. Click on file again and scroll down to Port. Enter the port provided to you by the host in the advertisements section.

Enter in a username you like (not one being used by somebody else) and a password you won’t forget or one that others can figure out.

Click log in then you’re all set if you already have Moparscape 3.2 Sryan already downloaded (if not go into the download section and find it and download it)

You’re all set.

Read full topic
